nodes.text: Nanofoil was a material used during the High Republic Era. The material was present in a dark-gray scarf that the Tholothian Jedi Indeera Stokes possessed during her time at the Jedi outpost on the Outer Rim planet Elphrona around 232 BBY. The scarf could be used as a mask to protect Stokes from the planet's dust storms and could be molded into almost any shape she might need.
Nanofoil appeared in the 2021 novel The High Republic: Light of the Jedi, written by Charles Soule.
